data.message: Not sure if this isYou ..but Wow..My awesome boy who goes to college and works part time and gives 150percent...can rap  all your  lyrics..which is a feat in itself.. and I truly believe ..you are his inspiration...but he wont say it ..he has too much pride..Irish and Polish..l)..so just putting out there can i bring him for a meet and greet ...just cuz..your a great guy..and as a Mom you got me appreciating Rap..;)..xo
